*This is your weekly reminder to please update the Weekly Team Update Notes before standup on Monday:*

messages.username: New Ventures Tribe Weekly Notes Reminder

elements.text: This is your weekly reminder to please update the Weekly Team Update

messages.text: Hey folks :alert2: from Assaf's presentation last week we're kicking off the product demos next week to present in front of the company: *who would be open to present something on LIVE from our tribe?*

messages.text:
Heya team,

Just a heads up that in a leadership channel this bug <https://hellofresh.atlassian.net/browse/DPLAT-2364|ticket> was raised, and although it mentions that it only affects Factor & HF, in the discovery it was mentioned that <https://hellofresh.slack.com/archives/C04QG9G93S9/p1758228319684479?thread_ts=1758119183.297329&cid=C04QG9G93S9|more> brands are affected so I'm thinking this might be related to some of the cadence issues we have been seeing across GoodChop & TPT in the past.

<@U027201FQSV> <@U8F7ZDAPM> <@U03UMPD2NNS> <@U01AKGWGLC8> Have we gotten complaints about this flow in the past and could we take a moment to quickly confirm if this is an issue for our brands pls? :pray:

elements.text: The ticket says brands affected are Factor and HF, but was this checked on other brands? Looking at the doc in the ticket

its affecting all brands in Canada, so this also includes Chefs Plate, and I'm assuming other markets if we haven't tested. We have had one-off issues with inconsistent cadences on GoodChop so I will get the NV team to confirm

elements.text:
Heya team,

Just a heads up that in a leadership channel this bug
was raised, and although it mentions that it only affects Factor & HF, in the discovery it was mentioned that
brands are affected so I'm thinking this might be related to some of the cadence issues we have been seeing across GoodChop & TPT in the past.
Have we gotten complaints about this flow in the past and could we take a moment to quickly confirm if this is an issue for our brands pls?

_thread_replies.text:
interesting
I'll review the flows in the afternoon

elements.text:
interesting
I'll review the flows in the afternoon

_thread_replies.text: I think, thanks to Endless Pause we might be safe in here. I just tested changing the address and the delivery is still expected in the same week.

elements.text: I think, thanks to Endless Pause we might be safe in here. I just tested changing the address and the delivery is still expected in the same week.

_thread_replies.text: Tested and no issue for Good Chop

elements.text: Tested and no issue for Good Chop
